name: Rail work at intersection Wilhelminenhofstraße / Edisonstraße
description: Big construction site re-doing the complicated switch layout at the intersection. No trams going down Wilhelminenhofstraße, sidewalks are restricted as well.

images.alt: Construction work at Edistonstraße 63 completely blocking all traffic
Construction work at Edistonstraße 63 completely blocking all traffic

name: Construction site at Schöneweide station
description: Road-/Railwork under the bridge at Schöneweide station, no trams driving

images.alt: Construction work at the train station S-Schöneweide blocking blocking tram lines

name: Replacement bus service Prenzlauer Allee
description: Construction going on between S-Bahn Greifswalder Straße and Gesundbrunnen, no Ringbahn S41/S42 going from Prenzlauer Allee, replacemenet bus service to Greifswalder Straße

images.alt: Information poster about the replacement service and ongoing construction
